item.title: My first post
item.description: This is my first post using Blogdown! library(ggplot2) ggplot(mtcars, aes(x = mpg, y = wt)) + geom_point() + geom_smooth() ## `geom_smooth()` using method = 'loess' and formula 'y ~ x'
